name: NYC NFT
description:
The year is 2025, NYC….Back in the 80’s, this was known as a Mecca for crime and corruption.  Strong governance helped remove much of the corruption but the icing on the ‘big apple’ was the blockchain.   

This futuristic street art neon curation is focussed on ‘Times Square’.  Time has passed…Time stops for no-one.    

Crypto Aliens have traversed and time-traveled to earth via the blockchain.    Crypto Alien Babes (CAB) with their epic human partners have saved the world from the ‘dark ones’ from disrupting the blockchain.  The CAB anime animation series is now celebrating its 1000th episode. 

  This 2025 image of NYC is a retro look back on CAB’s humble beginnings and Eggs incubating before their famed launch back in November 19/20th, 2021.  You can even spot Xenot on the billboards.  The CAB NFT community is world-renowned for its charity work and selfless acts.  Transparency is the key currency of CAB and the blockchain.  

People no longer have to second guess governments.  Banking is no longer ‘hide-and-go-seek’.  Everything is out in the open.  It’s almost impossible to take ‘bribes’ anymore.  No more middle-man.   

The world is DAO run.  The Grow Group, IDO platform ‘Equinox’, CAB, and our very own ‘Starseed’ brand -  thanks to their incredible communities - have exposed the bad actors in the crypto industry. The industry is now humming along with excitement.   

NYC NFT 2025 is close to my heart. I first started my career in modeling there.  I established the ‘Pangaea’  brand.  And started my deep love affair with photography and art.  


Back in 2021, NFT’s were a simple way for anyone to enter ‘crypto’. They helped to bring ‘crypto’ to the universe.  Provably authentic. Transparent provenance. Secure yet globally and instantly accessible. Royalty monetization for creatives, enhanced liquidity are just some of the benefits of NFT’s.

  Thank you once again for being part of the change.    Long live CAB, NOX, GROW, XENOT, EQUINOX and their awesome communities.    

Love,  Starseed
